Name: maximize_feature_priority
Description: Prioritize implementing features with the highest priority score to deliver maximum business value.

Name: minimize_feature_estimated_effort
Description: Favor features that require less estimated effort to increase overall output.

Name: maximize_project_priority
Description: Select and resource projects that have the highest strategic importance and priority.

Name: minimize_project_budget
Description: Optimize resource allocation to keep the total cost of projects as low as possible.

Name: maximize_stakeholder_influence_satisfaction
Description: Prioritize work on features that are relevant to stakeholders with a high influence level.

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Aim to reduce the number and severity of blockers to ensure a smooth development process.

Name: maximize_user_story_priority
Description: Within a sprint, select user stories that have the highest priority to focus on immediate value.

Name: minimize_user_story_points
Description: For a given goal, try to achieve it with the minimum number of story points to be efficient.

Name: maximize_team_satisfaction
Description: Strive for process improvements that lead to higher team satisfaction in sprint retrospectives.

Name: maximize_velocity_trend
Description: Encourage a positive, increasing trend in team velocity over multiple sprints.

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Optimize the sprint plan to maximize the probability of achieving the sprint goal.

Name: maximize_worker_availability
Description: Prefer to assign tasks to workers who have higher availability.
